item.title: Max: The curse of brotherhood
item.description: Review Likes Really cool idea for puzzles Art is great (even on Switch), except for the disgusting eyes Final boss battle was awesome Dislikes Story was kind of overlooked, although great Kind of short Some challenges required lots of speed and coordination

item.title: Pokemon Shinng Pearl
item.description: Review My first Pokèmon game ever! Likes Variety of Pokèmons Art is pretty nice, love the chibi style Gamplay is straightforward, no walking around, trying to figure out what to do next Side content available: Super Contest Show, Lottery, etc Dislikes Wild encounters could get a bit annoying, especially early game in caves, although Max Repel does help Log Roster (pre-Cynthia) Empoleon ✔️

item.title: The Legend of Zelda BotW
item.description: Review Likes Graphics are amazing Controls are awesome - you can do lots of stuff and they’ve managed to find a place for everything and make it easily accessible Quirky dialogues Lots of jokes Variety of content: side quests, main quests, battles, collectibles, etc Dislikes As a person that’s not really used to open world games, I got lost constantly In Progress Complete the Main Story Great Plateau Dueling Peaks Hateno Village Zora’s Domain Vah Ruta Dungeon Goron City Vah Rudania Gerudo Town Vah Baoris Dungeon Rito Village Vah Medoh Dungeon Captured Memories The Master Sword Hyrule Castle The Champions’ Ballad Get the Ancient armor set
